item.title: The Bass Fishing Board Game involves moving around the board to different fishing spots with your boat pawn. At those spots you can use a combination of lures, action cards and dice for a chance to land a big bass. The object of the game is to fill your live well with 5 of the largest fish. At the end of the tournament, each player’s live well weight is calculated and a winner is determined.
item.description: The Bass Fishing Board Game involves moving around the board to different fishing spots with your boat pawn. At those spots you can use a combination of lures, action cards and dice for a chance to land a big bass. The object of the game is to fill your live well with 5 of the largest fish. At the end of the tournament, each player’s live well weight is calculated and a winner is determined.
